text:
Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card.

Encore (After this resolves, stash it instead of discarding it.)
title: 99 Bottles . . .

text: Zap - Target hired Monster gains 2 power for this fight. Then squish this.
title: Backup Dancers

text: Zap, Pay 1 gold - Flip your Run Away marker.
title: Blue Suede Shoes

text: When this damages a Monster in a fight, the attacker must Spill 2 (move 2 cards from the top of the deck to the discard pile).
title: Brass Kicker

text:
Move 1 damage from your Hero to target stashed Monster.

Encore (After this resolves, stash it instead of discarding it.)
title: Can't Touch This

text:
When this is committed to a fight and the Monster is hired, roll the die.

1–3: Squish this.
4–6: The die roll has no effect.
title: Chopsticks

text: Zap your Hero card - Choose 1 Mischief card in your discard pile and move that card to your hand.
title: Cool Shades

text: Zap, Pay 1 gold - Deal 1 damage to target Hero.
title: DJ Tim

text:
Sing the name of this card aloud. If your opponent sings the name of this card back to you, you each draw 1 card.

If your opponent does not, you each Spill 1 (move 1 card from the top of the deck to the discard pile).
title: Earworm

text:
Deal 3 damage to target Monster.

Monstrous 3 (When this is committed to a fight, it is a 3 gold, 3 power, 3 life Monster card. Its card type changes to "Monster" and it has no other ability.)

text: When this is hired, all committed gold is moved to your purse.
title: Freebird

text: Zap target unzapped Loot you control.
title: Grody Roadies

text: Defender draws 1 card.
title: Groupies

text:
Draw 2 cards.

Encore (After this resolves, stash it instead of discarding it.)

text:
Zap or unzap target Loot or Ally.

Encore (After this resolves, stash it instead of discarding it.)
title: Irresistible Disco

text: Stick this to target Weapon in your opponent's hoard (that opponent now controls this card). When that Weapon is zapped, target opponent must draw 1 card.

text:
X equals the power of target Monster in opponent's stash.

That opponent must choose to either take X damage or squish that Monster.

text: Take 2 damage. Then deal 1 damage to all Allies.

text: Survivor (This ability triggers when this survives the fight.) - Squish this.

Use only when a card is moved face-down to your stash.

Zap - Move that card to your hand. This is an interrupt.

text: For this fight, this gains 1 power for each face-down card in your stash.
title: Shrieking Fans

text: During each Hero's reckoning step, that Hero stashes the top card of their deck without looking at that card.

text: Stick this to target Ally. Ignore that Ally’s ability.

text:
This comes into play zapped.

When any Hero plays a Mischief card with a gold cost of 2 or more, that Hero takes 1 gold.

text: During each Hero's reckoning step, that Hero draws 1 card.

Zap, Move 2 tokens from this card to the stockpile - Deal 1 damage to any target.

Use when you squish a hired Monster.

Zap - Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Stash 1 and discard the other. This is an interrupt.

text: Survivor (This ability triggers when this survives the fight.) - Zap target Loot controlled by the defender.
title: Yelling Goat!

text: Squish target hired Monster, then roll the die. You take damage equal to the amount shown on the die.

Take 2 gold. Your opponent takes 1 gold.

Use on your turn.

Zap - All Heroes ignore the ability of target Loot until your cooldown. This card cannot be chosen as the target of this ability.

Play when a Hero is caught cheating.

That Hero takes 2 damage.

Zap - Deal 1 damage to target opponent. This is an interrupt.

Use when a Monster deals damage to you.

Zap - Prevent 1 damage to your Hero and deal 1 damage to that Monster. This is an interrupt.
title: Rear Deflector

text: Zap - Unzap Weapon you control.
title: Shiny Manipulator

text: Deal 4 damage, divided any way you choose, between target hired Monster and its controller.
title: Spin Kick

text:
Play when your Run Away marker shows "Run Away".

Squish all Loot. Then flip your Run Away marker to show "Limp Away".
title: Stomp, Stomp, Stomp!

text: Target opponent takes 1 damage for each Monster in their stash.
title: Tavern Brawl

text: When this is committed to a fight and the hired Monster is squished, the attacker Spills 3 (Move 3 cards from the top of the deck to the discard pile).
title: The Banhammer

text:
This gains 2 power for each gold you overpay to hire this.

If you overpaid for this, squish this at the end of the fight.
title: The Pain Train

text: Zap a Weapon you control - Deal damage equal to that Weapon's power to any target.
title: Thwack!

text: When this damages a Monster, you may take 2 damage to unzap this.
title: Über-Blade

text: Zap your Hero - Deal 1 damage to target Ally.
title: Unnatural Axe

text:
Play when you squish a Monster with a Weapon.

You heal 3.
title: Weenie Buffet

text: Smack (Zap this during your turn to deal 1 damage to target Hero or target stashed Monster.)
title: Whacka-Maul

text: When you play a Mischief that deals damage, this deals 1 damage to target Ally or Monster.
title: Amulet of Ridiculous Power

text: When this is hired, you may take 1 damage. If you do, take 2 gold.
title: Beezlebob

text:
Draw 2 cards.

Give Blood 1 (When you play this, you may also take 1 damage to activate this ability.) - Reduce the gold cost of this by 2 gold.
title: Blood Geyser

text: Stick this to target Hero card. Increase the gold cost of that Hero's Monsters by 1 gold.
title: Bodius Odiferus

text:
Flip this card like a coin from a height of at least 1 meter above the game area.

If it lands face-up, deal 1 damage to any target.
If it lands face-down, take 1 damage.
title: Coin Elemental

text:
Deal 2 damage to target stashed Monster.

Give Blood 2 (When you play this, you may also take 2 damage to activate this ability.) - Remove that Monster from the game instead.
title: Crash and Burn

text:
Stick this to target Loot.

That Loot cannot unzap.
title: Curse of Quack

text: Move target Ally or target Loot to its owner's hand.
title: Disappearing Act

text: Move 1 damage from target Hero to any other Hero.
title: Dr. Feelbad

text:
Use when a Treachery card is moved to the discard pile.

X equals the gold cost of that card.

This is a copy of that card.
title: Forked!

text:
Roll the die.

1: Draw 1 card, then all Heroes discard 1 card.
2–5: All Heroes draw 1 card.
6: Draw 2 cards.
title: Hack-in-the-Box

text: Flaunt (Reveal this card from your hand to use this ability.) - Deal 2 damage to all Heroes, then discard this.
title: Heart of the Cards

text: Zap - Reduce the gold cost of the next Mischief you play this turn by 1 gold.
title: Human Wizard

text: Reduce the power of all Monsters by 1 until cooldown.
title: Jazz Hands

text: Deal 5 damage to any target.
title: Kaboom!

text: When this damages a Monster in a fight, it also deals 2 damage to the attacker.
title: Magic Missile

text: During each Hero's reckoning step, if that Hero has no Allies in play, that Hero may draw 1 card.
title: Pity Party

text:
Play when checking for cheating.

Reduce the gold cost of the committed Monster by 1 gold.

Give Blood 1 (When you play this, you may also take 1 damage to activate this ability.) - Reduce the gold cost of this by 1 gold.
title: Portal Kombat

text: Deal 1 damage to all Heroes, Allies, and stashed Monsters.
title: Rain of Death

text: Survivor (This ability triggers when this survives the fight.) - Choose 1 card from your discard pile and stash that card.
title: Re-Animator

text:
When this comes into play, move 4 tokens from the stockpile to this card.

Each time this is committed to a fight, remove 1 token. When you do, deal 1 damage to any target.
title: Rod of Owies

text: Zap - Prevent 1 damage dealt to target Ally. This is an interrupt.
title: Sequined Robes

text: Reduce the damage each committed Weapon deals to this Monster by 1.
title: Smug

text: Look through your deck and choose a Treachery card. Reveal it, move it to your hand, then shuffle your deck.
title: Spell-Ception

text: Stick this to target Weapon. That Weapon gains 1 power.
title: Spiky Bit

text: Zap your Hero card - Reduce the gold cost of the next Mischief you play this turn by 2 gold.
title: Staff of Magic

text: Take 2 damage when you commit this to a fight.
title: Stick of Suffering

text:
When this comes into play, if there is a copy of this card in your discard pile, squish this.

Any Hero may Spill 3 (move 3 cards from the top of the deck to the discard pile) to flip their Run Away marker.
title: The Last Ditch

text: When checking for cheating, the defender may pay any amount of gold to the stockpile. For each gold the defender pays, reduce the power of this Monster by 2.
title: Toll Dragon

text: Pay 1 gold - Regenerate (Stash this instead of moving it to the discard pile. This is an interrupt.)
title: Trollinator

text:
When this comes into play, if there is a copy of this card in your discard pile, squish this.

When a Monster deals 3 or more damage to a Hero, that Hero takes 1 gold.
title: Unfairgrounds

text: Deal 2 damage to target Ally or Monster.
title: Zorch!
